Title: The New Mutants
Writer: Josh Boone, Knate Lee, Chris Claremont (based on the Marvel comics by), Bob McLeod (based on the Marvel comics by), Len Wein (character created by: Magik), Dave Cockrum (character created by: Magik)
Actors: Anya Taylor-Joy, Antonio Banderas, Maisie Williams, Alice Braga
Plot: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
